title: Когда солнце взойдёт
overview: Rita and Igor are doctors, a wonderful couple. He is over 50, she is under 30. They have a significant age difference, but their relationship is harmonious, they work together, and there is complete mutual understanding between them. It is impossible not to admire their marriage, they are so attentive to each other, perceiving any problems with humor. Rita carefully protects the health of her husband, and this is a constant source of jokes on his part. But no one knows that their relationship is not legalized.
